title: How is prose, poem and drama similar? - Quora

response.answer_text: If for no other reason, prose, poetry, and drama, all attempt to convey the author’s thoughts and feelings about some aspect of the human condition. At their base, all three are forms of communication, one mind, one heart, one soul, to another. They each do it in different ways, but when it comes right down to it, they attempt to do the same thing.
